name: Sensible World of Soccer World Cup '98
overview: During the 1998 World Cup in France the Cresswell brothers made a special update, which was based on '97/'98 and contained also some new graphics. This "World Cup 98 update" was officially supported by Sensible Software and released on the Cover CD number 24 of the magazine "CU Amiga". But to use this update a hard disk installation was required which officially does not exist.
